creator: ville.skytta@iki.fi
text:
It could be nice to have support for Jikes' +Z,
"treat cautions as errors" option.

I'll attach a patch.

creator: ville.skytta@iki.fi
text:
Created attachment 1176
Support for Jikes' +Z option

creator: bodewig@apache.org
text:
Nightly builds support all kinds of additional compiler dependent arguments,
in your case, you'd use

<javac ....>
  <compilerarg value="+Z" implementation="jikes" />
</javac>

which is superior to adding new magic properties.

creator: ville.skytta@iki.fi
text: Oh, didn't catch that one anywhere. Looks good.
